titles.title: Congratulating the California State Polytechnic University, Pomona men's basketball team for winning the 2010 NCAA Division II Men's Basketball National Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 5/6/2010--Introduced. Congratulates the California State Polytechnic University, Pomona men's basketball team for winning the 2010 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division II Men's Basketball Championship.
